payload:payload.payload:heading: About me
payload:payload.payload:paragraph: I am a big fan of using technologies outside of their recommeneded opertating paramters, and making use of older technologies that have, now been supplanted. In the case of this site, XSLT.
payload:payload.payload:heading: About this site
payload:payload.payload:paragraph: This website contains my musings on various subjects. The website itself is prmarily build using XSLT to transform a XML response, currently written manually into a webpage. It is my intention to write an XML processing library in Odin, this will then be used to form the basis of a simple but more dynmic site, with the UI being written in a combination of XSLT / CSS & HTMX.
